# Ithaca Agency

Ithaca Agency builds custom software, system integrations, AI automation, and workflow solutions for teams in Greece and remote.

## Primary Page
- https://www.ithaca-web-agency.gr/

## Key Sections
- Hero and quick summary
- Services
- Selected work
- Process
- About
- FAQ
- Contact

## Language
- English and Greek (URL param: `?lang=en` or `?lang=el`)

## Contact Path
- https://www.ithaca-web-agency.gr/#contact
